## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e838cec17c1006b567e2a70f9554fd2a040c9fb0cfdf8d753e81548c1ea02c49)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'webquickauth' @ 2.3.5 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
